sections.title: Section 4
sections.content: Export Expert: Test Your Acrobat Exporting Skills    Welcome to the ultimate test of your Acrobat exporting skills! Think you know everything  about saving, converting, and exporting PDFs? It's time to put your knowledge to the test.  Dive into real-world scenarios, answer intriguing questions, and see if you have what it takes  to be a true PDF exporting pro 6.   Scenario:  You're preparing a presentation for a big meeting.
